name: Monkey Seen, Monkey Screwed
description:
Monkey Seen, Monkey Screwed

Tactical Espionage Ape Action

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys or WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Ctrl:  Pickup Bananas at Banana Factory / Drop off at the BTM

TIPS:

  • You're safe underneath a spot light's beam (unless you jump)
  • Obtaining banana's gives you more time.
  • The BTM deposits are worth triple--high interest rate :)

Help Monkey--a gorilla named Monkey-- collect enough bananas to deposit in the BTM before his automatic loan payment goes through tomorrow morning.   Robbing smoothie tower factories is tough work though, and your energy won't last forever.  But with every palmful, Monkey grabs and eats one banana, keeping his spirits up.  He will be a free gorilla again.  Until the inevitable next month payment is due.   

Concept, Code, and Art by Roolow in three days for Ludum Dare 50 (Jam)
